column1: 426823107865608192;"NNoperator#3835";"24-Apr-19 11:35 PM";"I'm having issues sending pirate from my node:  ```  komodo-cli -ac_name=PIRATE sendtoaddress REXrv8k2qcx8E8ZKZtkzjrv4Bwa6edDJiK 2

column1: 426823107865608192;"NNoperator#3835";"24-Apr-19 11:43 PM";"So that receiving node can be non-elected node then ?";"";"";
405011811511828481;"Alright#0419";"24-Apr-19 11:43 PM";"has to be a z addr on the other node";"";"";
